definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: I guess I'm just a country cousin.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我真是個鄉下佬。

sentences.english: Some of the villagers thought Birth had occurred.
sentences.chinese: 有的鄉下佬以爲梵天已經降生。

sentences.english: 'We don't like your type round here. '
sentences.chinese: “我們不喜歡你們這樣的鄉下佬”。

sentences.english: Absolutely, clodhopper have no word, face became white and went out one by one.
sentences.chinese: 絕對，鄉下佬沒有一句話，臉色白了逐一。

sentences.english: A bumpkin went to a big city for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 一個鄉下佬第一次去大城市。
